Legal_Issue: Procedural fairness, Credibility assessment, Internal Flight Alternative
Application_Facts: Five alleged contradictions were not presented to applicants for clarification; contradictory findings about Mariwala's size affected IFA assessment
Decision_Outcome: Decision set aside, case returned for re-determination
Court_Ruling: Judicial review allowed, decision set aside, re-determination ordered by a different Member
Defendant_Behavior: Failed to provide applicants opportunity to address credibility issues; inconsistent reasoning on IFA
Grounds_for_Claim: Lack of procedural fairness, inconsistent reasoning on credibility and Internal Flight Alternative
Legal_Standard: Applicants must be given opportunity to respond to credibility concerns; IFA must be reasonably assessed
Procedural_Issue: Failure to disclose contradictions for response, inadequate procedural fairness
Credibility_Assessment: Based on five alleged contradictions not raised with applicants
Evidence_Assessed: Testimony of applicants, size of Mariwala
Relief_Sought: Allowance of refugee claim through re-determination
Governing_Rule: Applicants must be given opportunity to address credibility issues; IFA must be reasonably assessed
Evidentiary_Deficiency: Contradictions not disclosed for comment, inconsistent findings on location size
Outcome: Decision set aside, matter remitted for re-determination
Harm_Assessment: Risk of unfair denial of refugee protection due to flawed process
Cause_Description: Rejection of refugee claim based on credibility issues and Internal Flight Alternative without procedural fairness
Evidence_Handling: Failure to allow response to alleged contradictions, inconsistent use of evidence regarding Mariwala
Evidence_Assessment: Insufficient and inconsistent evaluation of testimony and geographic facts
Decision_Rationale: Lack of procedural fairness and internally inconsistent reasoning undermined the validity of the decision
Evidentiary_Issues: Failure to disclose credibility concerns, inconsistent findings affecting IFA analysis
